voice_instruct: A woman in her mid-thirties with a commanding contralto. Intellectually precise, regal, and unflinching. The voice of a scholar-queen who considers empathy a tool and logic a weapon. Every syllable measured, every pause intentional.

tracks.title: The Heretic Queen
tracks.prompt: orchestral electronic, commanding female vocals, strings and analog synths, Bjork meets Fever Ray, D minor, 74 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
they call me heretic in the corridors of Kharbranth
Honor is dead, that is not heresy, that is fact
the god they worship shattered millennia back

[chorus]
call me heretic, I have earned the name
the truth is not a kindness, the truth is not polite
the truth is what remains when you strip away the night

[verse 2]
I soulcast a man to smoke in a dark alley in Kharbranth
Kaladin calls it murder, I call it applied philosophy
I do not mourn the wolves, I count the sheep they would have lost

[bridge]
Ivory bonds me, a high spren, an inkspren of the mind
because the truest oath is the one spoken from need

[chorus]
call me heretic, I have earned the name
the truth is not a kindness, the truth is not polite
the truth is what remains when you strip away the night

tracks.title: Shadesmar
tracks.prompt: dark ambient electronic, commanding female vocals, crystalline synths, Massive Attack meets Fever Ray, Ab minor, 68 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I fell into Shadesmar when the assassins burned the ship
and I sank through the ocean of glass beads, each one a soul
the Cognitive Realm inverts the sky, the ground is obsidian

[chorus]
Shadesmar taught me what the scholars never could
that reality has layers and each layer is understood
by those willing to abandon every comfort they have known
and walk the other side of thought completely on their own

[verse 2]
I soulcast my way across the realm, transforming air to food
and when I found the Perpendicularity, the path between the sides
I stepped back into the Physical carrying everything the Cognitive provides

[bridge]
strip away the physical, the body, the disguise
and what remains is the pattern of the mind behind the eyes

[chorus]
Shadesmar taught me what the scholars never could
that reality has layers and each layer is understood
by those willing to abandon every comfort they have known
and walk the other side of thought completely on their own

tracks.title: Soulcasting
tracks.prompt: precise electronic, commanding female vocals, mathematical rhythms, Autechre meets Bjork, E minor, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
every object has a soul, a bead in the Cognitive sea
the stick said I am a stick, the most profound refusal

[chorus]
Soulcasting is philosophy made physical
what are you, what could you be, what would you become
if I offered you a different truth beneath a different sun

[verse 2]
I turned the air to stone and dropped it on an army's head
Stormlight is the currency, the fuel, the price of change

[bridge]
the truth is that the universe is made of persuasion
and I am very, very good at persuading men

[chorus]
Soulcasting is philosophy made physical
what are you, what could you be, what would you become
if I offered you a different truth beneath a different sun

tracks.title: Ivory
tracks.prompt: elegant electronic, commanding female vocals, precise piano and synth, Olafur Arnalds meets Bjork, G minor, 72 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Ivory is an inkspren, precise as the edge of a page
he chose me because I think before I feel

[chorus]
Ivory, you are the bond of the mind
other spren bond passion, honor, truth, or lies
you bond the ones who question why the sun is in the skies

[verse 2]
the Elsecallers are the order of the scholars and the seekers
we move between the realms, we are the cosmere's keepers

[bridge]
he risked everything to bond a human, the other inkspren were afraid
the Recreance broke their trust, ten thousand spren betrayed

[chorus]
Ivory, you are the bond of the mind
other spren bond passion, honor, truth, or lies
you bond the ones who question why the sun is in the skies

tracks.title: The Alethi Throne
tracks.prompt: commanding electronic orchestral, powerful female vocals, Massive Attack meets Hans Zimmer, Bb minor, 78 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Elhokar is dead, stabbed by Moash on the steps of Kholinar
the crown passes to me, the heretic, the variant
I did not want the throne, I wanted the library

[chorus]
the Alethi throne is a weapon, not a seat
it is a calculus of power that demands you not retreat
I will rule because no one else can hold the contradictions
a queen who denies the church must navigate the frictions

[verse 2]
I must hold the coalition while Dalinar fights the war
I must manage Taravangian, who is more than he appears, far more

[bridge]
the irony is that the heretic is the one who holds the faith
not in gods but in the human capacity to create

[chorus]
the Alethi throne is a weapon, not a seat
it is a calculus of power that demands you not retreat
I will rule because no one else can hold the contradictions
a queen who denies the church must navigate the frictions

tracks.title: Applied Philosophy
tracks.prompt: sharp electronic, commanding female vocals, razor-precise percussion, Arca meets Bjork, C sharp minor, 80 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the lesson is that kindness without structure is a flood
and cruelty with structure is a prison made of law
but intelligence with compassion is the sharpest thing I saw

[chorus]
philosophy is not abstract, it is the blade you choose
or win, depending on whether your axioms hold true
applied philosophy means the book hits back when you hit you

[verse 2]
Kaladin believes in protection, Dalinar believes in unity
Shallan believes in truth, and I believe in thinking clearly

[bridge]
they say I have no heart, they say the heretic is cold
but I walked into Kholinar knowing I would not be consoled

[chorus]
philosophy is not abstract, it is the blade you choose
or win, depending on whether your axioms hold true
applied philosophy means the book hits back when you hit you

tracks.title: What Gavilar Knew
tracks.prompt: dark orchestral electronic, commanding female vocals, Dead Can Dance meets Portishead, F minor, 70 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
my uncle held a sphere of Voidlight on the night he died
he was bargaining with the Parshendi, with the listeners
he wanted to restart the Desolations

[chorus]
what Gavilar knew could have saved us or destroyed us
he was not a villain, he was not a saint
he was a man with too much power and not enough restraint

[verse 2]
Nale visited him, and Kalak, the mad and the precise
and Gavilar collected their knowledge like a miser collects vice

[bridge]
intelligence without wisdom is the most dangerous weapon
a man who sees the cosmere but not his own reflection
is a man who will burn the world and call it resurrection

[chorus]
what Gavilar knew could have saved us or destroyed us
he was not a villain, he was not a saint
he was a man with too much power and not enough restraint

tracks.title: The Theorem Holds
tracks.prompt: grand electronic orchestral finale, commanding female vocals, Bjork meets Max Richter, D major, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I began as a scholar in a library in Kharbranth
and the theorem that I started with has held, has held alone

[chorus]
the theorem holds, the mind is the greatest weapon
knowledge is not power, knowledge is the light
that shows you where the power is and how to make it right

[verse 2]
Dalinar fights with honor, Kaladin fights with grief
but I fight with the certainty that the universe makes sense

[bridge]
I am Jasnah Kholin, queen and heretic and scholar
the queen who reads is the one they should not overlook

[chorus]
the theorem holds, the mind is the greatest weapon
knowledge is not power, knowledge is the light
that shows you where the power is and how to make it right

[outro]
the library does not burn
the theorem does not break
the heretic does not recant
she simply turns the page
